an3.33:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.33:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
an3.33:4.5: vitthārenapi kho ahaṃ, sāriputta, dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ;
an3.33:4.6: saṅkhittavitthārenapi kho ahaṃ, sāriputta, dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ;
an3.33:4.8: “Etassa, bhagavā, kālo, etassa, sugata, kālo yaṃ bhagavā saṅkhittenapi dhammaṃ deseyya, vitthārenapi dhammaṃ deseyya, saṅkhittavitthārenapi dhammaṃ deseyya.
an3.33:5.2: ‘imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na bhavissanti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na bhavissanti, yañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ upasampajja viharissāmā’ti.
an3.33:6.1: Yato ca kho, sāriputta, bhikkhuno imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti, yañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ upasampajja viharato ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā na honti tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ upasampajja viharati;
an3.33:6.3: ‘bhikkhu acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassa’.
an3.33:6.4: Idañca pana metaṃ, sāriputta, sandhāya bhāsitaṃ pārāyane udayapañhe:
